body:
@civilmanxx: for weak isolation, use environment variable [CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-c-programming-guide/#env-vars).
For real isolation, you might want to run TensorFlow in [Docker](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#docker-installation). When using [nvidia-docker](https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker) you can set a variable `NV_GPU` to isolate devices.
